00040 class Anim_Sprite: public sf::Sprite
00041 {
00042         public:
00043                 enum Type
00044                 {
00045                         STAND,
00046                         WALK
00047                 };
00048 
00049         public:
00050                 Anim_Sprite();

00053                 bool set_position(unsigned int pos,float time);//set a new position at that time
00054                 void return_to_default_position(float time){position=default_position;time_begin_anim=time;};
00055                 bool set_default_position(unsigned int pos);
00056                 
00057                 const unsigned int get_position(){return position;};
00058                 const bool is_default_position(){return position==default_position;};
00059                 float x,y; //actual coord of center. The sf::Sprite coord are used only for drawing !
00060                 bool add_anim(Animation * anim);
00061                 void set_flipX(bool flip);
00062                 bool isXflipped(){return Xflipped;};
00063 
00064         protected:
00065                 std::vector <Animation *> anims;
